content:
I'd be happy to help you create a shopping list of cleaning products.

Here's a list of products we've discussed:

**Glass Cleaner:**

* Windex Original Glass Cleaner
* Method Squirt + Mop Glass Cleaner (optional)
* Seventh Generation Glass & Surface Cleaner (optional)

**All-Purpose Cleaner:**

* Lysol All-Purpose Cleaner
* Clorox Multi-Surface Cleaner (optional)
* Seventh Generation All-Purpose Cleaner (optional)

**Other:**

* Drano or another drain cleaner (if you want to tackle clogged drains)
* Scrubbing Bubbles Bathroom Cleaner or another soap scum remover (if you want to tackle soap scum buildup)

Feel free to add or remove items based on your specific cleaning needs and preferences.

If you want to add any other cleaning products to your list, here are some additional suggestions:

* Dish soap
* Dishwasher detergent
* Laundry detergent
* Mop and floor cleaner
* Toilet bowl cleaner
* Shower and tub cleaner
* Disinfectant wipes
* Microfiber cloths or sponges

Remember to check the prices and availability of these products at your local store or online retailer before you head out to shop.

Happy cleaning!
